Translations.Text: Abange Abakkiriza temulyanga Riba ekisobola okubatuusa okubazaamu emirundi n’emirundi, bulijjo mutye Katonda kibawe okulokoka ku lunaku lw’enkomerero
Era mutye omuliro ogwo ogwateekerwateekerwa Abakafiiri
Era mugondere Katonda n'omubaka olwo nno musaasirwe
Era mwanguwe nga munoonya okusonyiwa kwa Katonda wa mmwe, ne jjana eyo obugazi bwayo obwenkana eggulu omusanvu ne nsi, eyateekerwateekerwa abatya Katonda
Abo be bawaayo mu kkubo lya Katonda, mu biseera ebyessanyu ne by'obuzibu, era ababikka ku busungu, abasonyiwa abantu. bulijjo Katonda ayagala abakozi be birungi

Era abo bwebaba bakoze ebyobuwemu oba nebaba nga beeyisizza bubi (mu ngeri endala) bajjukira Katonda nebasaba okusonyiyibwa ebyonoono byabwe ate ani yandisonyiye ebyonoono okugyako Katonda! era nebatalemera kw’ebyo byebaakola ate nga nabo bamanyi ekituufu
Abo empeera yaabwe kisonyiwo okuva ewa Mukama Katonda waabwe ne jjana ezikulukutiramu emigga, nga bagenda kuzibeeramu bugenderevu, nga eriba mpera nnungi eri abo abakola emirimu emirongoofu
Bwebityo ebintu bwebibadde bitambula oluberyeberye lwa mmwe, kale mutambule mu nsi mutunule, mujja kulaba engeri enkomerero yaabalimbisa bweba
(Kur'an eno) kwe kunnyonnyola okuweereddwa eri Abantu era bulungamu era kwe kubuulirira eri abatya Katonda
Temuterebukanga era temunakuwalanga, ng’ate mmwe muli ku ngulu kavuna muba nga muli bakkiriza abannamaddala

Bwe muba mutuukiddwako obuvune (mu lutalo lwe Uhud) nabali baatuukwako obuvune ng’obwo (mu lutalo lwe Badr) nabwekityo bulijjo ennaku tuzikyusakyusa wakati wa bantu (olumu lw’ono, olundi lwa mulala) olwo nno Katonda ayawule abakkiriza, mu ngeri yeemu ajje mu mmwe abafiira mu kulwanirira eddiini era bulijjo Katonda tayagala beeyisa bubi
Era Katonda alyoke asengejje ayawulemu abo Abakkiriza, era azikirize Abakafiiri
Oba mulowooza nti muyinza okuyingira e jjana nga Katonda tannaba kwawula abo abaalwana mu kkubo lye mu mmwe, era naayawula na bagumiikiriza
Mwalinga mwegomba okufa nga temunnaba kusisinkana (Mu lutalo lwe Uhud) naye mubutuufu kwabatuukako nga mulabira ddala
